languages.text: {n}Вы чувствуете в душе странное спокойствие. Похоже, совершение подвигов стало для вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}чем-то привычным{/d}.{/n}
{n}Your heart feels strangely calm. It seems that performing feats of heroism has become {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}second nature{/d} to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Herz ist seltsam ruhig. Offenbar sind Heldentaten für dich mittlerweile eine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}Selbstverständlichkeit{/d} geworden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une étrange sérénité envahit votre cœur. Visiblement, l'héroïsme est devenu une {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}seconde nature{/d}, chez vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu corazón está extrañamente tranquilo. Parece que lo de las heroicidades es algo que te {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}sale solo{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart feels strangely calm. It seems that performing feats of heroism has become {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}second nature{/d} to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n} 心は不思議と落ち着いていた。あなたにとって英雄的な偉業を成し遂げることは、第二の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}天性{/d}になっていたように思えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart feels strangely calm. It seems that performing feats of heroism has become {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}second nature{/d} to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} 心は不思議と落ち着いていた。あなたにとって英雄的な偉業を成し遂げることは、第二の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}天性{/d}になっていたように思えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的心灵感到无比平静。看来，实现英雄主义的壮举已然成为了你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}第二天性{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart feels strangely calm. It seems that performing feats of heroism has become {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}second nature{/d} to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalbin tuhaf derecede sakin. Kahramanca eylemlerde bulunmak senin {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}tabiatın{/d} hâline gelmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
